item.title: Walmart is selling a 'very solid' and 'comfortable' patio glider swing for only $106
item.description: One shopper said that it "looks like it will last for years."

item.title: Amazon is selling a $330 cordless vacuum for $180 that's 'lightweight, cordless, and incredibly powerful'
item.description: "We use it in our home, cars and camper!"

item.title: Amazon is selling a $540 loveseat sofa bed for $243 that's 'comfortable and sturdy'
item.description: A versatile couch for anyone with limited space.

item.title: Walmart is selling a 'very nice,' all-steel platform bed frame for $97
item.description: Ditch the box spring and save hundreds on a sturdy, snazzy new bed.

item.title: Disney sends stern warning to customers amid boycott threats
item.description: Disney has made an unexpected announcement that may further frustrate customers.
